mapper.select:
select tm.todo_code,
tm.todo_content, tm.todo_complete, tm.importance_flag,
tt.total_count,
tm.create_date, tm.update_date from todo_mst tm LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM todo_mst) AS tt ON (1=1) order by todo_code desc limit #{index}, #{count}

select tm.todo_code,
tm.todo_content, tm.todo_complete, tm.importance_flag,
tt.total_count,
tm.create_date, tm.update_date from todo_mst as tm left outer join (select count(*) as total_count from todo_mst where importance_flag = #{importance}) as tt on(1=1) where tm.importance_flag = #{importance} order by todo_code desc limit #{index}, #{count}
mapper.update: UPDATE todo_mst SET todo_complete = case when todo_complete = 0 then 1 ELSE 0 end WHERE todo_code = #{todo_code}
UPDATE todo_mst SET importance_flag = case when importance_flag = 0 then 1 ELSE 0 end WHERE todo_code = #{todo_code}

update todo_mst set todo_content = #{todo_content},
update_date = now() where todo_code = #{todo_code}
